name: The Case Against Super ZZT - Bitsy Edition
name_original: The Case Against Super ZZT - Bitsy Edition
description:
After a recent discover of "The Case Against SZZT", a ZZT world in all caps telling everybody to stop making Super ZZT games and use regular ZZT instead, the Worlds of ZZT Discord had a lot of fun porting the world to Super ZZT and then other game creation systems including ZIG, MegaZeux, and now Bitsy.

There's a reason Super ZZT never took off, but it's probably not because of this persuasive game.
